statements: SELECT * FROM StockValues WHERE stock_name = 'Apple';
SELECT stock_name, current_market_value, purchase_price FROM StockValues WHERE stock_id = 5;
SELECT stock_name FROM StockValues WHERE current_market_value > 1000 ORDER BY current_market_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockValues ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;
SELECT stock_name, purchase_price, current_market_value FROM StockValues WHERE stock_name LIKE '%Microsoft%' AND purchase_price < 500;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, purchase_price, current_market_value FROM StockValues WHERE stock_id = 1;
SELECT stock_name, current_market_value, purchase_price FROM StockValues WHERE current_market_value > 1000 ORDER BY stock_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM StockValues WHERE purchase_price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY current_market_value ASC;
SELECT stock_name, purchase_price, current_market_value FROM StockValues WHERE purchase_price < 500 OR current_market_value > 2000;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, purchase_price, current_market_value FROM StockValues WHERE stock_name LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY purchase_price DESC, stock_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Stock;
SELECT Name, MarketValue FROM Stock;
SELECT PurchasePrice, Name FROM Stock ORDER BY PurchasePrice DESC;
SELECT * FROM Stock WHERE MarketValue > 1000;
SELECT Name, PurchasePrice FROM Stock WHERE Name LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY PurchasePrice ASC;
SELECT ID, Name, MarketValue FROM Stock WHERE PurchasePrice > 1000 ORDER BY Name DESC
SELECT Name, PurchasePrice, MarketValue FROM Stock WHERE MarketValue < 500 ORDER BY PurchasePrice ASC
SELECT * FROM Stock WHERE Name LIKE '%Tech%'
SELECT Name, PurchaseDate, PurchaseQuantity FROM StockHistory WHERE PurchaseQuantity >= 100 ORDER BY PurchaseDate DESC
SELECT ID, Name, PurchasePrice, MarketValue FROM Stock WHERE PurchasePrice < MarketValue
SELECT * FROM stock_inventory;
SELECT product_name, market_value FROM stock_inventory;
SELECT product_name, purchase_price FROM stock_inventory WHERE market_value > 100;
SELECT purchase_date, quantity FROM purchase_history;
SELECT product_id, current_market_value FROM stock_value WHERE value_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM stock_inventory;
SELECT product_name, market_value FROM stock_inventory ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT product_name, purchase_price FROM stock_inventory WHERE purchase_price > 50;
SELECT sh.purchase_date, si.product_name, sh.quantity FROM purchase_history sh JOIN stock_inventory si ON sh.product_id = si.id WHERE sh.quantity > 10 ORDER BY sh.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT sv.current_market_value, si.product_name FROM stock_value sv JOIN stock_inventory si ON sv.product_id = si.id
SELECT id, name, purchase_price, market_value FROM stocks;
SELECT name, market_value, purchase_price, id FROM stocks WHERE market_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT stock_id, date, value FROM stock_values WHERE value < 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT sale_id, stock_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE purchase_price > 1000
SELECT name, market_value FROM stocks WHERE market_value < 5000 ORDER BY market_value DESC
SELECT s.name, p.quantity, p.purchase_date FROM stocks s JOIN purchases p ON s.id = p.stock_id WHERE p.quantity > 100 ORDER BY p.purchase_date ASC
SELECT s.name, sv.date, sv.value FROM stocks s JOIN stock_values sv ON s.id = sv.stock_id WHERE sv.value > 5000 ORDER BY sv.date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT s.name AS stock_name, SUM(s.purchase_price) AS total_purchase_price, SUM(sv.value) AS total_value FROM stocks s JOIN stock_values sv ON s.id = sv.stock_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING total_purchase_price > total_value
SELECT * FROM Stock;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, market_value FROM Stock ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT stock_name, purchase_price FROM Stock WHERE purchase_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT stock_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM StockPortfolio GROUP BY stock_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Stock;
SELECT stock_name, market_value FROM Stock ORDER BY market_value DESC;
SELECT stock_id, purchase_price, market_value FROM Stock WHERE purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM StockHistory WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT Stock.stock_name, StockValue.current_value FROM Stock JOIN StockValue ON Stock.stock_id = StockValue.stock_id;
